snippet: The sister of a woman shot and killed on Saturday after Alabama’s loss to Auburn said the episode stemmed from another woman’s anger over the last-second upset.
abstract: Adrian Laroze Briskey, is charged with murder in the killing of 36-year-old Michelle Shepherd in Birmingham, Ala; both women were Alabama fans at a party for the annual game, Briskey became angry at victim because she did not seem upset enough over loss to Auburn.
lead_paragraph: The sister of a woman shot and killed on Saturday after Alabama’s loss to Auburn said the episode stemmed from another woman’s anger over the last-second upset.

headline.main: Game’s Outcome Is Tied to Killing
headline.print_headline: Game’s Outcome Is Tied to Killing
